doclet.comment:
/**
 * @tsdoc directive
 * @name tsForm
 *
 * @description
 * Displays a form.
 *
 * @param {Form} form the form.
 * @param {boolean} showOverview whether the form overview is shown at the start/end of the wizard.
 * @param {string} submitState the state to show when the form is complete.
 */
doclet.name: tsForm

params.description: whether the form overview is shown at the start/end of the wizard.
params.name: showOverview

params.description: the state to show when the form is complete.
params.name: submitState
